content.question: In paragraph 2 and paragraph 3, sentences 1-2 (“But Sundays . . . where she came from”), the author uses repetition primarily to emphasize the

choices.label: formulaic approach many people take to structuring their lives
role of cooking in a form of traditional religious practice
frequent opportunities the author had to develop culinary skills as a child
relationship between a recurring activity and a place of origin

content.answer: relationship between a recurring activity and a place of origin

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
